title: Episode 68 – Corona Virus Special w/ Aaron Perry & Artem Nikulkov
subtitle: Sarah Arao Mantle of Hope- Thank You Video to the Y on Earth Community for GoFundMe Campaign Support
description: Recognizing that “VUCA” aptly describes our global situation (marked by Volatility, Uncertainty, Complexity, and Ambiguity), they discuss how “VUCA PRIME” (Vision, Understanding, Clarity, and Agility) is the key to staying grounded, focused, healthy, and a positive resource for our communities. (This framework was first shared by Dr. Jandel Allen-Davis in Podcast episode #30).
